name: Moody Mountain
description:
HOW TO PLAY

The rules are simple. Satisfy Pele (big volcano goddess overlooking the island) and she will NOT burn you to kingdom come! 🙂

- You must control the Tribal men by clicking on them and place them on any of the places given in the game to claim certain objects.
- Placing the Tribal on a tree will generate wood.
- Placing him on the mine will generate gold.
- When placed on the empty plots, the Tribal will build a hut, which in turn will generate more Tribal men.
- The Top Left corner indicates the resources necessary to satisfy Pele.
- The Top Right corner indicates the amount of resources you have (wood, gold and tribals).
- Failure to satisfy the goddess will make her go Kaboom and you would have failed the inhabitants of the island SMH.

Enjoy!
